title: Why should I write 25 headlines for a blog post? - Quora

response.answer_text: The legend goes that an Editor at Upworthy once said: “Thou shalt write 25 headlines!” And so it began… all writers were supposedly forced to write 25 headlines for every piece of content:  (you can check out Upworthy’s original slides here) Of course, you don’t really need to write 25 headlines for every blog post, article, email, or whatever you’re writing - but it can help! Why? Because it forces you to practice and “think outside the box” and by choosing your best, you’re more likely to get engagement, whether you want to: Increase traffic or clicksGet more social sharesImprove SEO rankingWin at life (or blogging)If you want to learn more about writing titles for blog posts, including why you should write 25, as well as how to write great headlines - you can check out this article I’ve written: Why 25?
